translations.This email is sent to you to inform you: This email is sent to you to inform you about the result of a poll you participated in. At least your name or your email address was recorded in this poll. If you want to be removed from this poll, contact the site administrator or the poll initiator, where the mail is sent from.
translations.{owner} wants to inform you about the fi: {owner} wants to inform you about the final result of the poll "{title}"
translations.The used time zone is \"%s\", based on t: The used time zone is "%s", based on the detected time zone at your registration time. To view the times in your current time zone, enter the poll by clicking the button below.
translations.This link gives you personal access to t: This link gives you personal access to the poll named above. Press the button above or copy the following link and add it in your browser's location bar:
translations.Do not share this link with other people: Do not share this link with other people, because it is connected to your votes.
translations.This email is sent to you, because you a: This email is sent to you, because you are invited to vote in this poll by the poll owner. At least your name or your email address is recorded in this poll. If you want to get removed from this poll, contact the site administrator or the initiator of this poll, where the mail is sent from.
translations.{owner} invited you to take part in the: {owner} invited you to take part in the poll "{title}" as a member of the group {group_name}
{صاحب} شما را دعوت به شرکت در نظرسنجی "{عنوان}"
translations.This email is sent to you, because you s: این ایمیل برای شما ارسال شده است ، زیرا در اعلان های این نظرسنجی مشترک هستید. برای امتناع ، از نظرسنجی بازدید کرده و اشتراک خود را حذف کنید.
translations.Updated poll configuration. Please check: Updated poll configuration. Please check your votes.

A voting option has been confirmed.

The poll owner has been changed.
A voting option has been unconfirmed.

translations.The poll is about to expire in less than: The poll is about to expire in less than {leftPeriod} hours ({dateTime}, {timezone}).
translations.{owner} sends you this reminder to make: {owner} sends you this reminder to make sure, your votes are set.

translations.A polls app, similar to Doodle/Dudle wit: A polls app, similar to Doodle/Dudle with the possibility to restrict access.
A polls app, similar to Doodle/Dudle with the possibility to restrict access (members, certain groups/users, hidden and public).
translations.Send information about confirmed options: Send information about confirmed options by email
translations.Although participant's names are hidden,: Although participant's names are hidden, this is not a real anonymous poll because they are not hidden from the owner.
translations.Additionally the owner can remove the an: Additionally the owner can remove the anonymous flag at any time, which will reveal the participant's names.
translations.Error while saving comment: هنگام ذخیره توضیح خطایی رخ داد
translations.Error while deleting the comment: هنگام حذف توضیح خطایی رخ داد
translations.The automatic reminder is sent to all sh: The automatic reminder is sent to all shares via email:
translations.48 hours before the expiration date, if: 48 hours before the expiration date, if the poll is created more than 5 days before the expiration.
translations.36 hours before the expiration date, if: 36 hours before the expiration date, if the poll is created more than 2 and less than 5 days before the expiration.
translations.48 hours before the first date option, i: 48 hours before the first date option, if the poll is created more than 5 days before the first date option.
translations.36 hours before the first date option, i: 36 hours before the first date option, if the poll is created more than 2 and less than 5 days before the first date option.
translations.For polls created less than 2 days befor: For polls created less than 2 days before the expiration.
translations.If a share already got a reminder (no ma: If a share already got a reminder (no matter, if the expiration date got changed).
If the poll is already closed.
translations.Hide results until poll is closed: Hide results until poll is closed
translations.Title: عنوان
translations.Create a sequence of date options starti: Create a sequence of date options starting with {dateOption}.
translations.Add options list (one option per line): Add options list (one option per line)
translations.Each line creates a new option. Duplicat: Each line creates a new option. Duplicates will get skipped without warning.
translations.Results are hidden until closing poll: Results are hidden until closing poll
translations.Results are visible since closing poll: Results are visible since closing poll
translations.By clicking the \"OK\" button you accept: By clicking the "OK" button you accept our {privacyPolicy}.
translations.The name {username} is invalid or reserv: The name {username} is invalid or reserved.
translations.You will receive your personal link afte: You will receive your personal link after clicking "OK".
translations.Enter your email address to get your per: Enter your email address to get your personal access link.
translations.Email could not be sent to {emailAddress: Email could not be sent to {emailAddress}
translations.Enter your name or a nickname: Enter your name or a nickname
translations.Add terms links also to the email footer: Add terms links also to the email footer
translations.Enter the URL of your privacy policy: Enter the URL of your privacy policy
translations.Enter the URL of your legal notice: Enter the URL of your legal notice
translations.Use calendar lookup for conflicting cale: Use calendar lookup for conflicting calendar events
Select the calendars to use for lookup.
translations.Specify in which period (in hours) befor: Specify in which period (in hours) before the option existing appointments should be included in the search results.
translations.Specify in which period (in hours) after: Specify in which period (in hours) after the option existing appointments should be included in the search results.
translations.Text polls default to list view: Text polls default to list view
translations.Check this, if you prefer to display tex: Check this, if you prefer to display text poll in a vertical aligned list rather than in the grid view. The initial default is list view.
translations.Date polls default to list view: Date polls default to list view
translations.Check this, if you prefer to display dat: Check this, if you prefer to display date poll in a vertical view rather than in the grid view. The initial default is grid view.
translations.Enter the amount of days, polls without: Enter the amount of days, polls without activity stay in the relevant list:
translations.A poll with many options and voters can: A poll with many options and voters can have a heavy impact on client performance.
translations.Set the amount of voting cells (options: Set the amount of voting cells (options x participants) up to which all voting cells should be displayed.
translations.The default threshold of 1000 should be: The default threshold of 1000 should be a good and safe value.
translations.The style settings are still experimenta: The style settings are still experimental!
translations.Use alternative styling for the comments: Use alternative styling for the comments sidebar
translations.Resolving of {name} is not possible. The: Resolving of {name} is not possible. The circles app is not enabled.
Resolving of {name} is not possible. The contacts app is not enabled.
translations.Link copied to clipboard: پیوند در حافظه موقت کپی شده
translations.Error while copying link to clipboard: هنگام کپی کردن پیوند به حافظه موقت خطایی رخ داد
translations.Do not ask for an email address: Do not ask for an email address
translations.This is an openly accessible poll: This is an openly accessible poll
translations.Please be careful when changing options,: Please be careful when changing options, because it can affect existing votes in an unwanted manner.
translations.As an admin you may edit this poll: به عنوان مدیر شما می توانید این نظرسنجی را ویرایش کنید
translations.Shift all date options: همه گزینه های تاریخ را تغییر دهید
translations.Receive notification email on activity t: Receive notification email on activity to {emailAddress}
translations.Is granted admin rights for this poll: Is granted admin rights for this poll
translations.Mail could not be resent to {emailAddres: Mail could not be resent to {emailAddress}
translations.Copy your personal link to clipboard: Copy your personal link to clipboard
translations.Get your personal link per mail: Get your personal link per mail
translations.Copy list of email addresses to clipboar: Copy list of email addresses to clipboard
translations.Type to add an individual share: Type to add an individual share
translations.If you are experiencing connection probl: If you are experiencing connection problems, change how auto updates are retrieved.
translations.Add links to legal terms, if they exist: Add links to legal terms, if they exist and add an optional disclaimer to emails.
translations.No polls found for this category: No polls found for this category
translations.Do you want to take over this poll?: Do you want to take over this poll?
translations.Do you want to delete this poll?: Do you want to delete this poll?
translations.Combine multiple date polls in a single: Combine multiple date polls in a single view
translations.Select polls by clicking on them in the: Select polls by clicking on them in the right sidebar!
یک نظرسنجی وارد کنید یا یک مورد جدید را شروع کنید.
translations.Set your personal preferences for the po: Set your personal preferences for the polls app
translations.Try to change these parameters to handle: Try to change these parameters to handle big polls
translations.Maybe the owner did not provide some unt: Maybe the owner did not provide some until now.
Your polls (in which you are the owner).
translations.All private polls, to which you have acc: All private polls, to which you have access.
All polls, where you placed a vote.
translations.A complete list with all openly accessib: A complete list with all openly accessible polls on this site, regardless who is the owner.
All polls, where you have access to.
translations.All closed polls, where voting is disabl: All closed polls, where voting is disabled.
translations.Your archived polls are only accessible: Your archived polls are only accessible to you.
